revenue_status_and_projections

revenue_status_and_projections.Rmd

revenue_status_and_projections is a report of financial metrics of the project. It’s run weekly for the REDCap admins and director-level staff and adhoc as revenue is collected. The report provides graphs and tables on Revenue and Receivables, Revenue and projections by fiscal year, and Aging

revenue_status_and_projections data processing workflow

Developed by Philip Chase, Laurence James-Woodley, Kyle Chesney, Michael Bentz, Sai Pavan Kamma.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.0.
